body_html:
Yes, I think this is a good idea. Not everything should go in PyTorch but some of it's useful.

The main problem is people are going to want to bikeshed the APIs if you do this. Probably best to tackle things one at a time, for the things that you really, really want.

body:
Yes, I think this is a good idea. Not everything should go in PyTorch but some of it's useful.

The main problem is people are going to want to bikeshed the APIs if you do this. Probably best to tackle things one at a time, for the things that you really, really want.
